TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit CallSiteHelpers extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Class that contains helper methods for DLR CallSites.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool IsInternalFrame(class System.Reflection.MethodBase mb) cil managed

Docs.summary: Checks if a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase"> is internally used by DLR and should not be displayed on the language code's stack.
Docs.returns: True if the input <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodBase"> is internally used by DLR and should not be displayed on the language code's stack. Otherwise, false.
